channel.title: Black vs White 1st BattleGround server{508}-updated(12.6.2009)
channel.description:
[img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/2536/omga.jpg[/img] [font=Verdana]v0.9[/font] [size=20pt] 508[/size] :D made by me !
[size=14pt][b]Developing Progress:[/b][/size] ###################################################### [size=13pt]|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||[/size][size=20pt]88,5%[/size] of complete v1.0 ######################################################
[b]Hi, this is my 1st big project based on MithScape v1.[/b]
[b]So.. how it looks if you Login new acc:[/b] [b]1.[/b] you will select your side Black/White by clicking on black/white chests in home area... [b]2.[/b] now you need to select your class... melee/range/mage [b]3.[/b] now you are free in BattleGround so you can run to kill other side members.. for: - cash(used for exp in lamps), - items(they should make you stronger or they are needed for Quests)
[i]if you are in black side you cant wear white items[/i] [i]if you are in white side you cant wear black items[/i]
[b]To do list:[/b] ´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´ [table][tr][td] -2sides based on player rights workin -done -black can attack only white players and npcs-done -white can attack only black players and npcs-done [b]-you can choose wich class you wanna be:[/b] Melee black||white -done Ranger black||white -done Mage black||white -done [b]-Pk Quests:[/b] Vengeance power ring Quest -done Ancient d hide book -done Wrath of Farseer -done Cold Steel -done -Training place -done -Black cant open white shops -done -White cant open black shop -done -Autocast working 110% -not yet only 50% -NPC vs NPC -needs to be done -Custom client interface -maybe later -Mage working on NPCs -bad we need this!!![/td][/tr][/table] ´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´
[b]Now some my EXTRA ideas:[/b] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Upgrading items by using player bones on it like: combat robe 0 needs used 25 bones on it to upgrade it to combat robe 25...50...75...100.
Extra item operates like: regen bracklet if operate - it allows you to safe up +25 of your normal max HP for 40 seconds like: if i have 50 of normal max HP and if i used it i can have for 40 seconds 25 HPs more!! 50+25=75 hp!!! [b]RATE THIS ??!?![/b] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]This server needs webmaster / forum mods... thy will get mods ingame...[/b] [b]This server needs Client / Server coder(i am actually coder), wich will be admin on server :D...[/b] [b]This server needs an hoster, wich will be payed for this afer fisrs donates...[/b] I cant advertise here so guys if yo like to join us PM.... Oooo and"[i] I <3 newty [/i]" [b] Pictures:[/b] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Rangers[/b] ----BONUSES ARE BALANCED---- [img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/5331/whiterange1.jpg[/img][img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/7181/blackrange1.jpg[/img]
[b]Mages[/b] ----BONUSES ARE BALANCED---- [img]http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/5058/whitemage1.jpg[/img][img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/2807/blackmage1.jpg[/img]
[b]Melee[/b] ----BONUSES ARE BALANCED---- [img]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/9383/whitemelee1.jpg[/img][img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/933/blackmelee1.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt][b].:*BRUTAL ARMORS*:.[/b][/size] Needs: -85def/85str/85hp -Quest "Cold Steel"
[b]White[/b]----BONUSES ARE BALANCED NOW---- [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/3347/whitedboots.jpg[/img]
[b]Black[/b] ----BONUSES ARE BALANCED NOW---- [img]http://i393.photobucket.com/albums/pp11/leavenow1/FullBlackBrutal.png[/img]
[b]and other Pictures:[/b] [img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/6476/whit1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/2852/whit2kjx.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/473/white3t.jpg[/img] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-kill ppl for money,armors and weapons [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/7083/howtogetmoneydiea.jpg[/img]
Join white or black: click on chest [img]http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/7545/blkjawhite.jpg[/img] choose what u wanna be: melee, range or mage! [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/846/rangemagemelee.jpg[/img] ice barrage ice! [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/7320/barrageiceq.jpg[/img] d bow work! [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/7782/dbow.jpg[/img] working veng! [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/8796/workingveng.jpg[/img] shops! [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/5797/shoparena.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt][i][u]Guys Ill make more pics tomorrow like as cant wear or cant open the shop.. :D [/u][/i][/size]
[u][b][size=30pt]IF YOU WANT OR CAN JOIN US PM ME[/size][/b][/u]
[u][b][size=30pt]IF YOU WANT TRY SERVER PM ME ILL SEND YOU IP..[/size][/b][/u]

item.title: Black vs White 1st BattleGround server{508}-updated(12.6.2009)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Revolver Mr Revolver
item.description:
@Mr_Revolver wrote:

[quote=“Your Master, post:28, topic:282888”][quote author=Mr Revolver link=topic=373810.msg2822838#msg2822838 date=1244745258]

This is a great idea :].
But I noticed something.
That stats are balanced.
Though that’s not a bad idea, I think it would be cooler if white side had more defense bonuses, but the black side add more attack bonuses. You know?

Then the Black side would have no chance vs White.

How do you figure?
I mean just add a little bit higher bonus to the white armors, and then add a few attack/strength bonuses to the black side’s armor…?
[/quote]
Dude im coding an train area on it, and were not changing do White side have more def bonus. It will not be fair for Black side, done![/quote]
Not done.
You didn’t answer the question.
The black side gets attack and strength bonuses to make it even…?
Also, by "Coding an train area on it, do you mean changing the coords in the autospawn?

Read full topic
